lines.text: You came into my house, you ate my spaghetti and meat-balls, you took my money, you took my clothes, you stole my girl... and let me tell you this, right now... Nobody, but *nobody* eats my food!

[During the song "Fat Like That"]
More bounce to the ounce, more room to rock!
You don't know anything about me!
Oh no, that sounds like a cue for another song! I gotta get outta here!
See, that just proves my point!

[Hoe down]
I courted a girl for fifteen years/ Her folks said we should wed./ But if my horse could only cook,/ I'd marry him instead!
